info.name: MyCRM API Sample
info.description:
To use this sample it is necessary to populate the `Variables` section with the values supplied to you by Loan Market Group. This will enable the various samples to interact with your broker account in MyCRM. 

**NOTE:** If you are looking to replicate the behaviour of these samples, be sure to check the `Pre-request Script` section where the authorization flow is handled.

item.name: Get Last Contact Group Contact Email
Get Recent Contacts w marketing consent

body.raw:
{
    "data": {
        "type": "leads",
        "attributes": {
             "title": "Mr",
            "firstName": "Fred",
            "preferredName": null,
            "lastName": "Flintstone",
            "email": "fred@bedrock.com",
            "mobile": "0412345678",
            "dateOfBirth": "2000-07-29",
            "gender": "Male",
            "hasMarketingConsent": true,
            "isGuarantor": false,
            "isDependant": false,
            "isPrimary": true,

            "streetAddress": "111 Eagle St",
            "suburb": "Brisbane",
            "state": "Queensland",
            "postCode": "4000",
            "country": "Australia",
            "addressType": "Current",

            "noteTitle": "About the lead",
            "noteDetails": "This is why it happened",

            "utmSource": "facebook",
            "utmMedium": "social",
            "utmCampaign": "mycrm-fb",
            "utmTerm": "investment",
            "utmContent": "lm",
            
            "sourceSystemUrl": "https://www.loanmarket.com.au/brokers/direct/our-team/michael-atherton"
        }
    }
}

exec: // Refresh the OAuth token if necessary
expiresInTime = 300000; // Set default expiration time to 5 minutes
// Set the ExpiresInTime variable to the time given in the response if it exists
